traceability.title: Traceablity
traceability.description: ...as basis for building digital data chains and enabling data chain-focused use cases

sections.title: Introduction
sections.description: The aim of the use case traceability is to establish continuous data chains: from raw materials via components to the finished vehicle at the OEM or its recycling within the recycling company. Partners in the use case include manufacturers of components, automotive manufacturers as well as suppliers of materials and parts.

sections.title: Core Values of Catena-X represented in Traceability
How to contribute to Traceability and why?
Brief explanation of most important terms
Traceability subdivides the data models for each life cycle phase
Opportunities to participate in Use Case Traceability
sections.description: Based on individual company needs, traceability offers various ways to participate in the use case. You can decide for yourself in which role (e.g. data provider and/or data consumer) and to what extent you participate in the use case.

sections.title: Business Applications inside Traceability
sections.description: The traceability use case is strengthened by a number of business apps which help the user to visualize and easy access the treaceability chain. Below you can find an overview of all available apps. Use the direct link to open the app details page.

detailsWithImageRow1.title: Trusted Traceability
detailsWithImageRow1.description: is a fully managed system (software-as-a-service) and enables the introduction of traceability...
